about_the_game:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

  • Ironclad Dwarf
  • Elven Knight
  • Scarred Ranger
  • Monk Explorer
  • Sorceress
  • Southern Barbarian
  • Forged Fighter
  • Upland Barbarian
  • Duergar Champion
  • Duergar Fighter
  • Duergar Monk
  • Duergar Crossbowman
  • Duergar Wizard
  • Duergar Rogue
  • Duergar Axeman
  • Duergar Cleric
  • Derro Fighter
  • Derro Rogue
  • Deep Gnome
  • Stone Giant

Requires: An active subscription or license of Fantasy Grounds. It will work with any ruleset.
detailed_description:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

  • Ironclad Dwarf

Minimum:

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
